name: Hack Land Military Hack 2
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
When defeating a [All] unit, earn [1000] Gold and recruit it
All newly-trained [All] units [in all cities] receive the [2nd Hack Land Ability] promotion

name: Hack Land Military Hack 1
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles
Units ending their turn on [All] tiles take [0] damage
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [9999999] XP
New [All] units start with [9999999] Experience [in all cities]
All newly-trained [All] units [in all cities] receive the [1st Hack Land Ability] promotion

name: Hack Land Gold Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [All] tiles
[-9999999]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]
May buy [All] buildings for [0] [Culture] [in all cities]
May buy [All] units for [0] [Culture] [in all cities]

name: Hack Land City-States Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [1] turns.
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [9999999]
Influence of all other civilizations with all city-states degrades [1000]% faster
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [1000]% more Influence

name: Hack Land Culture Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
[-9999999]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies

name: Hack Land Faith Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
May not generate great prophet equivalents naturally
May choose [999] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
May choose [999] additional belief(s) of any type when [enhancing] a religion

name: Hack Land Happiness Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
[1000] Happiness from each type of luxury resource

name: Hack Land Food Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Hack Land Science Hack
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Hack Land Production Hack

name: Hax For Everyone!
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
All newly-trained [All] units [in all cities] receive the [Hax For Everyone! Ability] promotion
[+1000 Gold, +1000 Production, +1000 Science, +1000 Food, +1000 Culture, +1000 Faith, +1000 Happiness] per [1] population [in all cities]
Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]

May buy [All] units with [Faith] for [64] times their normal Production cost
